definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Further improvements have been added to the video pop-out feature.
sentences.chinese: 視頻彈窗得到了更多改進。

sentences.english: Optimize a webpage as far as possible, had better not do play a window to perhaps float advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 儘可能優化網頁，最好不要做彈窗或者漂浮廣告。

sentences.english: Open topology diagrams in a separate pop-up window.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在另一個彈窗中打開拓撲圖。
